description: The method by which source cells were reprogrammed into pluripotent stem cells.

anyOf.description: Integration-free reprogramming of somatic cells into induced pluripotent stem cells manufactured by ThermoFisher Scientific.
Non-integrative episomal vector methods used to reprogram somatic cells into induced pluripotent stem cells.

A pluripotency induction technique that employs Sendai virus vectors to force expression of a combination of genes sufficient to induce pluripotency without integration or alteration of the cellular genome.
